divs: sighting detailsit was approx 2am in the morning. i had just woke up from a dream, and as i looked at the ceiling i felt relieved i had woke up because of the nature of the dream, i didnt want to stay indulging in it. anway i moved my head from the ceiling towards my computer that is located near a window which was open (very warm night). that is when i saw the object. it hovered there right beside my computer, it almost reminded me of a colorful looking childs remote control, sophisticated jellyfish\flying saucer. basically what one would look like in 50 years from now. it seemed to hover directed beside my computer as if it were communicating with it at the same time watching me as i slept,. i got a good look at it and that is all i got. i was scared to death. ive always been intrigued of the ufo phenomena and wished to see something in the night skies. this was different though. this was in my home hovering beside my computer and it scared me. so i turned away, wiped my eyes to make sure i wasnt dreaming still and took a quick glance back to see if it was still there. it was gone. im not sure as to what this was. whether from this world or not, but i know that it was high tech, and the scaryiest part, was, how it got through the window screen. almost like it would have been transparent,. all i know is that im not crazy, and im not on drugs\medication. i saw this thing. it was there. now i wish i would have not turned away, but it was my first reaction to something so different. anyway, i think there is something out there watching us, and i for one want to know what the hell it is!!!!!! in one sense i am frightend by this incident, but on the other hand i am mystified and want to know more about it,. i have included a sketch, sorry for poor quality, but its the best i could do for now. if anyway else has had a simular expierence please help me to contact them, or contact me thanks ebenjamino@gmail.com
